alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:43PM CDT until April 15 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Montgomery County in east central Missouri... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 442 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Big Spring, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 441 PM, trained weather spotters reportedd ping pong ball sized hail in Rhineland, Missouri. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Montgomery City, New Florence, Mineola, Rhineland, Danville, and Americus. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 170 and 175. This also includes Graham Cave State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
